Class Player

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a player in a game of Go Fish
    Author:
    NO AUTHOR

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name)
        Create a player
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player

    • Method Detail

      • findPairs

        public void findPairs()
        Finds all the pairs in the players hand. For each pair found, adds it to the player's list of pairs and increase the player's score by 1.

      • requestCardFromPlayer

        public boolean requestCardFromPlayer(Player other,
                                     Rank rank)
        Ask the other player for a card with a specified rank. If the other player has the card, the card is removed from the other player's hand and is added to this player's hand.
        Parameters:
        other - the player being asked for a card
        rank - the rank of card that is being asked for
        Returns:
        true if the other player had the card false if the other player did not have the card

      • giveCardWithRank

        public Card giveCardWithRank(Rank rank)
        Searches the hand for a card with a specified rank.
        Parameters:
        rank - the rank to search for
        Returns:
        the first instance of Card in the hand with rank. returns null if no such card exists.

      • goFish

        public void goFish(Deck deck)
        The player will draw a card from the deck and adds it their hand.
        Parameters:
        deck - the player draws from this deck

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Unit test for Player
        Parameters:
        args - -unused-
